universal_guidelines: Use StyleSheet.create for styles but import tokens from src/design/tokens.ts
All interactive elements must have haptic feedback (expo-haptics).
Animations must run at 60fps using Reanimated worklets.
Accessibility: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for text.
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds; use the Navy theme.
The 'Orb' must be the central focus of the Casting screen.
Glassmorphism must be implemented with 'expo-blur' and specific semi-transparent backgrounds.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install the required dependencies. 2. Create the 'src/design/tokens.ts' file first. 3. Build the core UI components (GlassPanel, Button, Slider). 4. Implement the OrbVisualizer using Skia. 5. Build the screens using Expo Router.
